DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety efficacy acetaminophen 650 mg acetaminophen 1000 mg dental surgery .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Safety Efficacy Acetaminophen 650 mg 1000mg Dental Pain After Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This trial ass relative efficacy acetaminophen 1000 mg versus acetaminophen 650 mg six-hour period , subject experience least moderate post-operative dental pain .
DOC.criteria: Must least 16 less 51 year age Must weigh least 100 lbs body mass index least 18 less 30 Must four back teeth ( thirdmolars ) pull Can allergic acetaminophen ( Tylenol ) Can pregnant ( plan pregnant ) nursing baby Can medical condition investigator determines might compromise safety study result
